item.title: Spring doesn’t stop by anymore
item.description: I walk the same streets, without hope. Hope to see you, a passing glance, my game of chance.

item.title: Loving/Leaving
item.description: It’s easier to miss people than loving them I give away goodbyes like candy on halloween

item.title: October evenings
item.description: These days I don’t count the cups of coffee as my memories melt into daydreams

item.title: Midnight Express
item.description: There’s a loneliness in the city Its corners too big to fit me

item.title: Carousel
item.description: We were paper boats In water, running Delicate, just a brisk breeze away
Legal Disclosure Information in accordance with the applicable law Shachi Singh 2021

A Brief History of Everything I Like (In progress: giving some order to the chaos) “The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing” -Blaise Pascal Music Poets of the fall: Given and Denied, Cradled in love.

Discrete Finite Element Analysis of behaviour of Advanced Ceramics Guide: Prof James Hogan | Centre for Design of Advanced Materials, University of Alberta (June 2021 - Present) • Exploring approaches to modelling the granular behaviour of ceramics (Boron Carbide and Alumina) to validate experimental results under the MITACS GRI Program.
